segments.text: My attention is drawn to the center of the room where a boy is engaged in a risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's climbing on a two-step stool, trying to reach something in an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the stool's legs are splayed and it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s tilting backward, and I fear it might tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, almost painfully so, as he reaches into a jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s an impressive display of determination, if a bit reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself or break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him toppling over makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is so intense, a classic mission for a young boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so pleased with himself for getting up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
